## Before you do anything else

- Fork this repository and then clone it to your laptop.

- Install [`gssr`](https://kjhealy.github.io/gssr) and [`gssrdoc`](https://kjhealy.github.io/gssrdoc), following the instructions on their web pages.

## Setup and Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gssr)
library(gssrdoc)
```


```{r}
data(gss_all)

gss_all
```
